txt.en: 'Good evening to you! You are just in time -- the Elder is still preparing, but the clan has gathered already.\n\n'Come, follow me! This is the most important night of the year for my people.'

'This is very unsettling. The poor bird tried to land, but friendly hands did not receive it. We will surely scout at first light.\n\n'You heard the Elder, [placeholder] -- our festival is at an end. You should take some food and rest, for you have earned it.'
Instance: The Feast of the Running Stag
'We should leave, [placeholder]. I will talk to you again before I go to scout the farm.'
This looks like a good place to sit and watch
The Elder has asked you to fetch the crown
You have dropped the crown
The Feast of the Running Stag is about to begin.
The Elder smiles at you as you place the crown at his feet
Talk to Elain
You should perform the <rgb=#FF0000>/sit</rgb> emote near the bonfire to observe the festival.
You have dropped the horse-tail
The Feast of the Running Stag has begun.
You have placed the horse-tail at the Elder's feet
You should observe the Feast of the Running Stag.
You have dropped the spear
The Elder's ritual crown can be found at the doorway from which he entered.\n\nYou should collect the crown and carry it carefully to the Elder.
You have brought the Elder the final piece of the ritual set
The Elder's ritual horse-tail can be found at the doorway from which he entered.\n\nYou should collect the horse-tail and carry it carefully to the Elder when he is done speaking.
The crow was intercepted before it could reach the farm in the south
The Elder's ritual spear can be found at the doorway from which he entered.\n\nYou should collect the spear and carry it carefully to the Elder when he is done speaking.
The Feast of the Running Stag continues.
The Elder has called an early end to the Feast of the Running Stag this year, due to likely danger in the south where some of his people live.
Talk to Elain
Join the Stag-clansmen and observe the rites
Observe the Feast of the Running Stag
Observe the ritual as it unfolds
Bring the Elder what he asks for
Bring the Elder what he asks for when he is finished speaking
Bring the Elder what he asks for when he is finished speaking
Observe the rites
Listen to the Elder
Elain is at the Feast of the Running Stag.\n\nYou should speak with Elain about the injured crow and the missing southern family.
The Feast of the Running Stag has been disrupted by the ill omen...
You have arrived at Lhan Tarren as the Feast of the Running Stag began and have been invited to join the Stag-clan for the evening.

The crow's wing appears twisted, as if someone attempted to break it cruelly. The message it bore is still attached to its leg.

You recognize at once that this was the crow you sent to the southern farm. Something very unfriendly intercepted this poor bird.

It is clear that the farmer's family never received this summons.
